column5: Vitamin B1 is water soluble and you cannot (within reason) take too much of it.If your doctor says different , ask him how many "minutes" of nutritional training he took in med school.

Yes, It really does work. I take B1 regularly as a preventative for neropothy due to diabetes. I could'nt figure out why I was the onlyone not getting bit last year. Well, after reading the latest posts I've come to the conclusion that it must be the B1. You can't take to much and Yes you will pee Y E L L O W......Remember eat a few and release a lot.....
b1 never worked for me or anyone i know. wish it did as bugs are the only bad thing about going up to canada.
If I take B1 B4 the B8 me. will it B ok 2B fishing B cause I took B1 B4 I B in Canada. It B about 2 weeks B4 I B there.:P
Just remember if B1 wont work for you use some A1 the flies really like that sauce!!!!

Hello all,I want to try the B vitamins for reducing my blood donation to bugs in Canada this year. I checked the archives and it was said that B1 was the vitamin, but I can't find it. Am I looking for the right stuff. If I am where have you found it.Thanks,Tim Blanchette

Any health food store, drug store, walmart, kmart etc etc - just about anywhere except a gas station or 7-11 ! I have never tried it myself but good luck.If my lake thaws in time I don't think bugs will be an issue.lobo
B 1 is the right item to get. Got mine at Wal-mart, used it last year & all 4 of us were amazed!
I'm confused....how does B vitamin help with bugs?

Supposedly changes the aroma of your sweat. Bugs don't recognize you as food so they leave you alone. Start taking 1 piil a day at least 10 days before you go & 1 pill a day when you are in bug country. We had guys slapping all around us(4 guys)last year & none of us that took the b1 had any problem. Some guys suggest checking with your MD just to be safe. The only side effect I noticed is you pee yellow till you stop taking the pills. Pills are cheap, about $4 at wal-mart--enuff for 5 or 6 guys for 17 days. As long as the doc ok's it, why not?
pee yellow, eh? Sounds pretty normal to me, I'd rather pee yellow and any other color! Thanks for the help....
Not just yellow, I mean YELLOW!!

I wish these B1 pills, garlic and other remedies for bugs worked for me and my crew. The bugs just love me like a big juicy steak and as a result we go up in August or Sept when they not too many of the little critters around.

You mean they dont work for everyone? I am just concerned about the black flies, By the time the (minnesota state bird) comes out most people in are party are not only bug proof but bullet proof as well lol!
